articles.description: Ian Goodfellow, who quit as Apple's director of machine learning at the beginning this month, has reportedly been snapped up by Google, which is more relaxed than Apple about working from home.
articles.content: A senior director at Apple who quit his job in protest at the company demanding staff return to the office three days a week has joined Google, according to a report - where work from home is allowed… [+10627 chars]
